name: Jack-o'-Lantern Punch

ingredients.name: Flor de Caña 7-Year-Old Grand Reserve rum

preparation:
Mix up a whole bunch of this fall-flavored punch for your Halloween party.

In a mixing glass, muddle sugar cubes, cloves and 1 oz soda until sugar dissolves.

Add remaining ingredients and ice and stir.

Strain into a punch cup.

Top with remaining 2 oz club soda.

Garnish with apple slices, cinnamon sticks and pumpkin seeds.

(You can also multiply this recipe, stir and strain into a punch bowl. Top each individual portion with club soda when serving).
